title: The Magnificents album Banner FONT ID
content:
Looking to ID the type that reads “NEW ALBUM OUT NOW CD AND DOWNLOAD”. THANK YOU ALL IN ADVANCE

-danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163227im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/albumadbanner7yw1_3855.jpg)

author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
It’s hard to tell from this sample, but I think it’s [Orator.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705163227/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=orator&x=0&y=0&sample_text=NEW%20ALBUM)

- Lex
